articles.description: Australians with IPL deals have the chance to put their name forward for the World Cup squad later this year
articles.content:
The Indian Premier League is set to help shape Australia's Twenty20 World Cup squad as coach Justin Langer mulls some key selection calls.
The T20 World Cup remains the only major men's cricket tour… [+2241 chars]

articles.author: Lions Media
articles.title: Cam Rayner Injury Update [www.lions.com.au] - Brisbane Lions
articles.description: Cam Rayner will miss the remainder of the season after scans on Tuesday confirmed a ruptured ACL.
articles.content:
Cam Rayner is likely to miss the remainder of the season after scans on Tuesday confirmed a ruptured ACL.
